Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with fridge, kettle, wc, shower, safety deposit box, balcony or terrace. Tennis court, Basketball, Volleyball and a Mini football. Open: April to October. Built on 2002.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Situated on a hillside overlooking Sidari, Cosmopolitan Sidari Village - 700m. Nearest airport: 35km.
